name: Tongari Boushi to Mahou no Omise
name_original: Tongari Boushi to Mahou no Omise
description:
*'Tongari Boushi to Mahou no Omise' (とんがりボウシと魔法のお店 lit. "Pointy hats and the Magic Shop") is a fantasy-adventure and life simulation game developed and published by Konami and released for the Nintendo DS on November 11th, 2010 in Japan only. It is the second entry in the Magician's Quest series. Although it is a sequel to the previous work, 'Mysterious Times', there is no chronological connection.

*'Tongari Boushi to Mahou no Omise' has added the new element that allows players to open their own "shop" while continuing the game system of the previous work. Players can open various shops such as cake shops, restaurants, clothes, and accessory shops. Players create products arranged in the shop by playing minigames.

Additionally, you may now visit shops hosted by classmates, and even friends through local multiplayer. There are 27 new characters to come across, including a bundle of fresh items such as home styles, furniture, brooms, spells, insects and fish, and much more.

(*Source of Description - 'Magician's Quest Fandom Wiki'; 'Tongari to Mahou no Omise')
